name: Cool It!
description:
"Cool It!" is a puzzle game where you play as Mr. Poul, a Computer Engineer, who has a small business about adding water coolers to Computers.

Gameplay:

  • You will receive limited water pipes and electric wires to make the water cooler.
  • The pipes need to be conected to some specific parts, such as CPU and GPU to cool it. 
  • Sometimes the water flow will be too weak, so you will want to use a micro-pump to give some movement
  • Every micro-pump needs some electricity to work

How to play

  • When you click play and goes to the first service, you will see a inventory at the bottom of the screen, there will be shown to you all the pieces you have to complete the water cooling
  • To place a piece, you just swipe the piece and place where you want
  • To rotate the piece you need to double click it, it only rotate in 90°

Game submited to the Spring Game Jam 2023
